attributes.action: make councils grit the pavements or provide grit to residents so they can grit outside their homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thousands of people suffer broken bones or simply cannot leave their house when pavements are covered in snow and ice because there is no attempt to grit them. Even an occasional gritting would have a long lasting effect (unlike on roads where traffic removes it).
Councils should make an attempt to grit pavements and provision residents with grit for use outside their properties.
A resident who attempts to grit outside their dwelling should not be liable for injuries as might currently be the case.
